1. Business Description_Feedback: They provide general information regarding their product
2. Customer Discovery_Feedback: For now they have not started selling their product. Yet they have PoC agreements with well known primary / high schools
3. Product/Technology Validation_Feedbac: They claim to have a working prototype
4. Go-To-Market Tactics / Sales Model_Fe: Currently they focus on selling the product by themselves mostly to the schools. They should have a channel partner to suceed in that aim.
5. Finances and Funding_Feedback: Funding of this project will become hard in the future. They should be able to identify potential financing institutions to have a relevant level of working capital.
7. Team_Feedback: The team seems to lack of corporate expertise. This may have a negative impact at the scaling process of the firm.
